author: Taylor Hatmaker
title: CDC is expected to tell Americans to wear cloth masks, save medical masks for health workers
description: On Thursday, the White House said that it will likely soon adjust previous guidelines that discouraged non-health workers from wearing face masks. The change would be issued as “guidance” from the CDC, but according to the president—who continues to hesitate …
